amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on certain matters relating to the National Guard and Reserves.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2546 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2546 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Dayton. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12785) To express the sense of the Senate on certain matters relating to the National Guard and Reserves.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2546 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2546 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Dayton.
